desc: Intended as a capstone course for the major, the seminar studies a selected topic, figure, or movement in philosophy, with emphasis on independent research and student presentations. Consult department's prospectus for details. May be repeated if topics are different. Prerequisite: upper level philosophy major or consent of instructor. Offered every year.
name: Sem: Phil of Religion
prerequisites: Prerequisite: upper level philosophy major or consent of instructor. Offered every year.
title: Senior Seminar
